S.FORM: kakaliman tadamicidekay a imelang nu baluwang musaciid i baluwang tu ledeb palamit a mulahad mucelek, anu caay paiyu i sa, mangaleb pilahad tatacuwa, u matalay nu mitaaidas, miledek ku edes, talabangs amulahad, sa adidik a misengi ya katinenga i tasa, mahihiuh, u ti'ih ku udip, muhanhan a dada ku bauuwang makudus tu. ( :Lung cancer) . . (SCLC) (NSCLC). , , . nilaculan 85 katineng nu siimelangay sa namu tabakuway a tademaw, 10 15 na caay pitabak u duma sa, namakay baba lakiyaimalalid, makahelip tuangliway bali, anabuh saka tusa a tabaku, idaunay misakupaay, sasingn ku baluwang, masametek kiyamicidek kaya imelang. (85 ) 10 15 . , , . X (CT) CT . milawaay tu hanhan, 1.mahihhih 2.siisdang 3.masuni 4.u tiih ku hanhan. sakay udip, 1.makudus 2.masiyan 3.akuti' 4.makelulup ku kakanus. cidekay anu masakatil tu, 1.adada ku baluwang 2.adada ku ukak. 3.mipuet tu sahanhan. 4.utiih sae'nuc. : , , : , , : , , , . anu i hahan'hana kiy cidekay sa amapu'et ku hanhan nu misu tu malawa' ku ta'en u cawa misu, anu masaupu ku tuutuud i talulaw sa, apihaceng tu masied kiyabala' kiya. . namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
